mainText:
Steve,
Thank you for touching my life in ways you can't imagine. I was especially
inspired by your fighting spirit to persist to create value despite your
battle with cancer. I am also a 4th stage cancer patient and undergo the
process of living but you inspired me to never settle and not be burdened
with others' opinions. I wish you the best in your future journeys and till
the next tryst with life, Stay Hungry, Stay Foolish...

With deepest appreciation.
author: Neil
